metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44964 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use after free in garbage collector and finalizer of lgc.c in Luainterpreter 5.4.0~5.4.3 allows attackers to perform Sandbox Escape via acrafted script file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44964` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.4
lua5.4 - 5.4.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.4').
